Title: Establishes a health care disparities data collection system
Summary: Establishes a health care disparities data collection system.
LawCode: Amd §§210 & 4323, Ins L; amd §206, add Art 2 Title 3-A §§245 - 249, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to establishing a health care disparities data collection system
